name: Beowulf (itch) (vinnythemax)
description:
By Vincent Purr

This is my first ever bitsy game. I have made this as a project for my Digital Humanities class. Hope you enjoy it!

Music - Through the Fire and Flames [8 Bit Cover Tribute to Dragonforce] - 8 Bit Universe: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DvOmz2jvyGI
